mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memNo} AND CHECK_YN = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTIFICATION SET CHECK_YN = 0 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memNo}
mapper.select: SELECT N.POST_NO, N.REG_DT, N.MEMBER_NO, M.NM FROM NOTIFICATION N INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON N.APPLICANT_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE N.MEMBER_NO = #{memNo} AND N.REG_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
